website_summaries.verdict: While it has its sound limitations, particularly in the bass department, the downsized version of Scosche's BoomBottle H2O is a pretty decent little wireless speaker that's travel-friendly and repels water.
pros: The Scosche BoomBottle H2O is a compact, waterproof Bluetooth speaker that offers decent sound for its size and solid 11-hour battery life
It fits in the bottle holder on your bike, can be stood upright on a flat surface, or hung by an included carabiner clip
cons: has trouble with bass-heavy material at higher volumes

customer_reviews.title: This is a must for music lovers
customer_reviews.text: We have had one for a few years and the power, durability, and sound is still perfect. My husband and I seem to fight over who gets to use it so when I saw that they had it on sale again on Amazon we had to jump on it. This is one that you can actually take into the shower it’s wonderful I can get where it can be dry,it’s awesome!We both absolutely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Misty Darling

customer_reviews.title: Needs More Power for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Good quality indoor noise, loses its might when placed outdoors. The sound simply isn’t powerful enough to compete with traffic while I was bike riding. I purchased the Skoche H20+ and it was everything I dreamed of and more.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, you’ll be stoked!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little work horse, thing sounds great and you can drop, kick, throw, get wet, what ever,and she will sound great and keep going. It may not be as loud as some way more expensive speakers but I chose this speaker for the second time for a reason. ( had my first one for over three years and someone stole it) hence the second one.
customer_reviews.author: viengsavanh

customer_reviews.title: Oozes oily substance
customer_reviews.text: First time it got warm the top and bottom started oozing. Very oily and sticky and got everything in my bag nasty. Sound was good before and after but I store it in a plastic bag now since I can't return it so I don't ruin my other beach items.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: A great little speaker. Not the beeestttt sound. But durable. Water proof. Fell all the time. Very strong. A good bass. Battery life is long. Cheap. A good backup speaker
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to your phone speakers anymore.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds a TON better than the tiny speakers in your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: It is small and easy to use.  Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for use on the back deck . I also use it to listen to audio books. Plenty of volume and good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Blakney

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker really well, use it in my garage and at the firepit. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: James A Groseclose

customer_reviews.title: Love mine
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these they work great on my mountain bike and in my garage plus they are water proof so no worries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super portable
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this item is great. The charge lasts a long time; I just make sure I turn it off when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound from a small speaker. Don't like that I have to hold the power button so long (5 seconds) to turn unit on and off though. Besides that it seems like a solid, well made speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Novak

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money - decent speaker
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough sound and surprisingly loud - not very crisp sound but sturdy and stayed put through some pretty bumpy riding - I've seen this for $100 which is nuts but can't beat it at $40
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lipman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised that such a small inexpensive speaker can provide such good sound (and get so loud). Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Erick Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price very durable. Light long battery life,
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and durability firvtge price. Light enough to clip on the beach cooler or beach bag. Battery last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Roche

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The volume has decreased to the point I can't hear the music. Looking for my money back
customer_reviews.author: bill plante

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker at very affordable price. Very pleased with the Bottle.
customer_reviews.author: terp

customer_reviews.title: Best mobile speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase! Sounds great and the battery lasts a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jon D Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sleek, small, and strong.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to take on the go, holds a charge very well, and packs a surprisingly massive punch of sound despite the compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Rekrap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been great for taking music anywhere I go!
customer_reviews.author: fish36

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Robust, great sound, long lasting battery, Pairs easily, looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr L P A Evans

customer_reviews.title: This was the best speaker I ever bought for this price and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the best speaker I ever bought for this price and it really does pack a punch for the size and sound quality is awesome I would buy this again just to have another one on stand by
customer_reviews.author: kimal brown

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this little speaker! Well done Team Scosche!
customer_reviews.author: Kispiox

customer_reviews.title: the bass is bad, but they are waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These are not real loud, the bass is bad, but they are waterproof, durable, rechargeable and have a good overall sound. I would recommend it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Rebecca kinder

customer_reviews.title: Great.. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great..I love it... Especially on bike rides ot when I'm at work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying it very much small and has great sound
customer_reviews.author: JOHN SNIEDER

customer_reviews.title: Took it tubing down the river and it would only cut out a bit when totally submerged but other than that it worked awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the 50 bucks. Took it tubing down the river and it would only cut out a bit when totally submerged but other than that it worked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! It's fantastic for making the miles go by as I bike around town or across the country. I love that it is waterproof so I don't have to worry about it when the weather turns stormy. It's not a huge stereo, so you won't rock the block with it, which is just fine by me. I can hear my music and I can still hear traffic and communicate with people nearby. Battery life is excellent. The only thing I would change is the position of the volume buttons- they rub when going in or out of the water bottle cage. Other than that, it's pretty much perfect and worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: peter b

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased this item new from a store and LOVED it. It's a great size
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this item new from a store and LOVED it. It's a great size, durable, and has awesome awesome sound. What was extremely disappointing about the one I ordered here, was that it was not new. In fact it was very beat up and the speaker was blown... but it literally had a sticker on the outside of the box that said "new". What a joke, and waste of time. I was able to return it and get a refund but just look out for the third party people.
customer_reviews.author: avrey chavez

customer_reviews.title: Charge doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Dear Amazone. This speaker doesn't work. The promlem is can not charge but only direct connect electric power cable. So I can not use at outside. I want refunt. Pls answer me. B.Regards BS Yoon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bottle was much smaller than I thought, thus ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was much smaller than I thought, thus, the bang for the buck was not there! I kept it only because I can hang it on my shower holder and not worry about it getting too wet. The sound was crisp and clear, but my daughter's "home" speaker is much louder. She even paid less for her speaker. So if you are looking for a speaker that pumps out enough juice, I would consider some other alternatives as well. Update: this thing is not holding its charge and its only been <6 months! Let's see if they stand for their product on a return?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cervoni

customer_reviews.title: No longer the speaker I wanted. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This was the fourth "H20" speaker I've bought. I love the other three ! They have served us well for the last couple of years (even during camping abuse). The "power" button on the older units was fine....now it has been "up graded" and called a "multi-function button". What a pain in the butt !! It does not work properly. It gets stuck in what I guess is "pause" mode. I gave it to a neighbors child to play with after a week of frustration. Every time I shut it off, I had trouble get it to turn back on . Poor design !!!! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well on bicycle
customer_reviews.text: This my second purchase. My wife took my first one. I rarely use it but it work’s very well on bike. Fits well in bottle cage. Volume is adequate as is sound.
customer_reviews.author: herbie

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is charged when delivered and not battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with a full charge so I could use right away. Love that this is charged when delivered and not battery operated as it saves money in the long run. Was easy to set up bluetooth to my phone. I live in Florida so it's great for taking to the pool and beach. Even works great around the house for small parties and get togethers. Best part is that it shuts off automatically after 10 minutes of inactivity so it saves energy. Great quality for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazong Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power Button
customer_reviews.text: The power button drives me crazy. It takes like 10 seconds to turn it off, but on the up side the charge last for what seems like an eternity.
customer_reviews.author: eron feltz

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 1.6 years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this April 12, 2016 and here we are in January of 2018 and the speaker seems to have just died. Suddenly it won't take a charge. I was very impressed with how long each charge lasted, and it had experienced very little degradation so this is a little surprising. Not sure if I will buy another or look at other options.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Melted in car
customer_reviews.text: Got hot in car and melted got sticky and gross
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Angler

customer_reviews.title: This would be good for a shower but not for a group to listen to at the beach or pool.
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale for about $27. At that price it is really good. If it was more expensive, I would say that the volume and sound quality could be better. This would be good for a shower but not for a group to listen to at the beach or pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what happened with this speaker but it worked great for about a week and now sounds terrible. I haven't had time to look into options on an exchange but it's currently pretty worthless and we've only had it about a month.
customer_reviews.author: SHorseman

customer_reviews.title: Little Speaker Big Sound !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Speaker Cranks, indoor especially its even loud outside waterproof Bluetooth or you can use an audio cord very please would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ejay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This boom bottle it awesome! For being so little it packs a mad punch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and good sound. Took it with us on vacation, it is compact and works every ware
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Best recommendation
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend. I agree the sound is excellent and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Katy Fisher

product_meta.title: boomBOTTLE H2O Bluetooth Wireless Speaker Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:One Sizeboom BOTTLE H2O Bluetooth Wireless Speaker packs remarkable wireless audio into a rugged waterproof frame. It's Optimized for Outdoors and sounds great by the poolside, on the beach, in the mountains and everywhere in-between. Powerful 50mm up-firing speaker and passive subwoofer produce impressive clear audio and improved acoustics. The up-firing speaker sends music in all directions and includes a protective speaker grill and shock absorbing speaker cap. Can be submerged up to 1 meter for 30 minutes so it's great for pools, the beach, boats and more! It also floats for safe and convenient retrieval. Easily to use integrated front controls regulate play, pause, track forward/backward, plus adjust volume and more.
feature_bullets: IP67 rated dust and waterproof / buoyant construction
50mm driver & passive subwoofer produce rich and clear sound
Control play/pause and skip tracks from the boom BOTTLE H2O
Rechargeable lithium polymer battery provides up to 11 hours of continuous music playback

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
